I used to be just like you ahah :D 
Here's a few tips:

1. Loosing a normal game changes nothing, unlike ranked games.
2. Don't worry about feeding, but do play a champion you're comfortable with, if you're looking for a win.
3. If someone is giving you shit, just mute them. I practically mute for anything these days.
4. Listen to pings. Normals is much more strategical than bots, and you might not catching what's happening on the map. If your team mates are pinging something, pay attention.
5. CS is more important than kills. If you're winning lane but very behind on CS, you'll start to struggle later on.
6. Don't flame in chat. Please.
7. Never pick something because someone told you to. Fuck them and their Blitzcrank fetish.

Muting others prevents you from being even more harassed, which is why its a function.
And yes, Bots and normals are for fucking around, its for trying new things. Seeing if builds, runes and etc works.
The game is mainly for fun, the only seriousness to this game is when you actually wanna improve and try out the ladder.

But you can still have fun in ranked too, if you yourself are not an asshole. And you mute everyone once they become an issue.

if you think about it the only real problem is if you feed hard, or harder than the rest of your team. if you do happen to feed please agree to surrender and not waste up to 40 minutes doing fuck all while the enemy has you pinned in your base with supers coming in all 3 sides while they've taken every jungle creep in your side and they're fucking around to get more ip or some shit
